Description: RequirementsSignificant experience with the Genesys contact center platform, including Genesys Voice Platform (GVP), Genesys Intelligent Automation (GIA), and Genesys Voice Portal (GVP)Experience with Genesys routing strategy design and implementationProficiency in at least one programming language, such as Java, C++, or PythonWorking knowledge of VoiceXML, GVP Studio, and/or ComposerExperience with SIP protocol and telephony technologies such as VoIP, IVR, and ACDStrong analytical and problem-solving abilitiesExcellent communication and collaboration skills, both verbal and writtenJob Details
